result.execSummary:
The defendant Daniel J. MILLER was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • PTC Theft-Movable Property <=$2500 [Modifiers: Party to a Crime], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).
  • PTC Criminal Trespass to Dwelling [Modifiers: Party to a Crime], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.14.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: To Cody Piontek, joint and several with Justin Anderson.

If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.
Maintain full-time employment, schooling or work search.

Pay supervision fees in an amount to be determined by the Department of Corrections.

Submit to random urine screens and pay for same.

Maintain absolute sobriety.

Submit a DNA sample and pay surcharge.

Assessment, treatment, counseling as deemed appropriate by the Department's assessment process.

No contact with the co-defendant, Justin Anderson.

No contact with Cody Piontek and Joseph Rank or their residences and have no contact with Pawn America.
AODA assessment and follow through counseling.

timeConds.notes: Under the Huber Law, on count 1 only.

records.addlTxt: Plea date set for 11-22-2016 at 1:45 p.m., Br. 2.
State's Motion and Demand for Discovery.

Defendant waives his right to a preliminary hearing.   Defendant is bound over to Circuit Court Branch 2 for further proceedings.  
ARRAIGNMENT 
Information filed.   Not guilty pleas.  Jury Calendar.    Settlement conference with the District Attorney is set for 06-16-16 at 10:30 a.m.     
Minutes.
Initial appearance is reset to 01-25-16 at 2:30 p.m. in Branch 1.

BAIL HEARING - 
Defendant in custody and appearing by video from the Manitowoc County Jail.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crimes of burglary and criminal damage.  The matters are continued for initial appearance on 12-14-15 at 2:30 p.m. Bail is set at $1,500.00 recognizance bond with the conditions that he have no contact with Justin Anderson; Cody Piontek or his residence at 13623 Tannery Road, Mishicot, Joseph Rank or his residence at 620 S. Main Street, Mishicot.  Bail furnished and defendant is released from custody.
Minutes.
